name: Cougar's Quest for Freedom
summary: CQFF is the first game I made with AGS. I made the game for MAGS, a monthly AGS adventure game creation competition. The guideline was to make a game with animals as characters, so I decided that my cat attempting to escape from the house would make a good little quick game. I actually spent WAY more time than I expected on it, but I'm pretty happy with the end result.
